snippet: Organizers of the Tokyo Olympics estimate the total cost of hosting the 2020 Games will be between 1.6 and 1.8 trillion yen ($13-$15 billion)....
lead_paragraph: Organizers of the Tokyo Olympics estimate the total cost of hosting the 2020 Games will be between 1.6 and 1.8 trillion yen ($13-$15 billion).

headline.main: Olympic Organizers in Tokyo Disclose Total Cost Estimate
headline.print_headline: Olympic Organizers in Tokyo Disclose Total Cost Estimate
